By  Leah SpagnoliMarch  

DeKALB  Local BonTon stores are encouraging people to bring in clean gently used clothing and textiles during their semiannual Goodwill Sale PERIOD

According to a press release issued by BonTon participating customers receive one coupon per donated item  items equals  coupons PERIOD Coupons are good at all area Bergners Carson Pirie Scott and ElderBeerman locations PERIOD The sale will kick off today and run through March  PERIOD

Coupons are good for  percent off regular or saleprice apparel shoes accessories and fine jewelry  percent off cosmetics fragrances and home merchandise PERIOD Certain items including furniture electronics and toys can qualify for a  percent discount PERIOD

BonTon is the only department store nationwide that gives out  percent off cosmetics said Michelle Shanley store manager of the DeKalb Carson Pirie Scott  Sycamore Road PERIOD

Customers can receive discounts on brands like Lancome Clinique and Este Lauder PERIOD

I think its a great opportunity people getting a chance to clean out their closets and dressers while saving some money at the same time said Judy Furlong assistant floor manager of Goodwill in DeKalb  S PERIOD Annie Glidden Road PERIOD

Items can be brought to either the DeKalb Goodwill location or any of the listed BonTon stores listed PERIOD

Customers can register their donations online to receive another  percent off coupon to use during the sale PERIOD While on the website customers are encouraged to play the sites SpintoWin Instant Win Game daily to win a  gift card and to be automatically entered into a sweepstakes for a chance to win a trip to New York City to see LIVE with Regis and Kelly. i definitely think its a positive thing Shanley said PERIOD The sale not only benefits our customers but it benefits the economy as well PERIOD People get to buy new things while getting rid of old stuff. today is the only day that stores will be giving out double coupons meaning  items equals  coupons said Shanley PERIOD

To register donations and play the instant win game visit www.millionactsofgoodwill.com PERIOD
